content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'movies_demosynapsedls01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [movies_demosynapsedls01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/movies', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.rentals (
	[SourceSystemID] varchar(8000),
	[SourceSystemTransactionID] varchar(8000),
	[CustomerID] varchar(8000),
	[MovieID] varchar(8000),
	[RentalDate] date,
	[ReturnDate] date,
	[RentalCost] numeric(10,0),
	[LateFee] numeric(10,0),
	[RewindFlag] bit,
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/rentals.parquet/part-00000-213e5e01-fda8-4748-bb27-008cf1ae5e9e-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [movies_demosynapsedls01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.rentals
GO
